dcterms:creator: V. Makoviychuk
L. Wawrzyniak
Y. Guo
M. Lu
K. Storey
M. Macklin
D. Hoeller
N. Rudin
A. Allshire
A. Handa
G. State
dcterms:description: A high-performance GPU-based physics simulation environment designed for robot learning, enabling efficient training and evaluation of robotic manipulation tasks.
dcterms:title: Isaac Gym

dcterms:creator: M. Lutter
C. Ritter
J. Peters
dcterms:description: A framework that uses physics as a model prior for deep learning, enabling the inference of dynamics parameters from trajectories.
dcterms:title: DELAN (Deep Lagrangian Networks)

dcterms:creator: M. Lutter
K. Listmann
J. Peters
dcterms:description: An extension of DELAN for end-to-end learning of energy-based control for under-actuated systems, enhancing the modeling of dynamics in complex tasks.
dcterms:title: DELAN (Deep Lagrangian Networks for end-to-end learning)

dcterms:creator: A. Kumar
Z. Fu
D. Pathak
J. Malik
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on rapid motor adaptation for legged robots, providing insights into how robots can quickly adjust to new dynamics.
dcterms:title: RMA (Rapid Motor Adaptation)

dcterms:creator: Y. Chebotar
A. Handa
V. Makoviychuk
M. Macklin
J. Issac
N. Ratliff
D. Fox
dcterms:description: A study on closing the simulation-to-real loop by adapting simulation randomization with real-world experience, enhancing the transferability of learned policies.
dcterms:title: Simulation-to-Real Transfer

dcterms:creator: Y. Narang
B. Sundaralingam
M. Macklin
A. Mousavian
D. Fox
dcterms:description: A dataset focused on sim-to-real transfer for robotic tactile sensing, utilizing physics-based simulation and learned latent projections.
dcterms:title: Sim-to-Real for Robotic Tactile Sensing
